offlineMsg: You are offline. Check your Internet connection to browse and search for extensions

apiErrors.SERVER_URL_FAIL: There was an error establishing a connection to the server. Check the connection with your server or contact the developer
apiErrors.SERVER_FETCH_NOT_OK: Server response is not ok. Check the connection with your server or contact the developer
apiErrors.START_SERVER: Failed to start the backend. Please try again later or contact to developer
apiErrors.EXTS_CONVERT: Error converting extensions. Please check the format and try again.
apiErrors.EXTS_GET: Unable to retrieve extension resources. Please ensure the resource is available.
apiErrors.EXTS_SEARCH: Search operation failed. Please check your search criteria and try again.
apiErrors.EXTS_GET_FILE_DATA: Failed to retrieve data from the file. Please check the file and try again.
apiErrors.FACTS_RANDOM: Unable to fetch random facts. Please try again later.
